name: Kitty's Conundrum
description:
You play as a kitty that needs to help your human.
Use your special kitty vision to help you see things only cats can see.

Controls:
Move: WASD or arrow keys
Look Around: Mouse
Jump: Spacebar
Kitty Vision: Left Shift
Pausescreen: Escape

Made for Curdle Jam #15 (theme: Cat's Out Of The Bag)

Coding: NeoN_thriller
Graphics: Kenney Game Assets & Ladymito

Music: Jesse Gallagher - Spirit of Fire / Jesse Gallagher - Obelisks
